  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Effets qui maintiennent une planète dans son orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Effects that keep a planet in its orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekte, die einen Planeten in seiner Bahn 
halten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeitos que mantêm um planeta em sua órbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetti che mantengono un pianeta nella relativa 
orbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτελέσματα που κρατούν έναν πλανήτη στην τροχιά του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efectos que mantienen un planeta su órbita</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration démontre que le mouvement d'une planète loin du soleil et la pesanteur sont les forces qui  fonctionnent pour la maintenir dans son orbite autour du soleil.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that a planet's movement away from the Sun and gravity are the forces that work in keeping it in its orbit around the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Forces</string>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">force de la gravité</string>
            <string language="en">gravitational force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbites</string>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Bewegung eines 
Planeten weg von der Sonne und die Schwerkraft die Kräfte sind, die 
arbeiten, wenn sie sie in seiner Bahn um die Sonne halten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que o movimento de um
planeta away do sol e a gravidade são as forças que trabalham em a 
manter em sua órbita em torno do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che il movimento 
del pianeta via dal sole e la gravità sono le forze che funzionano 
nel mantenerla nella relativa orbita intorno al sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι η μετακίνηση ενός
πλανήτη μακρυά από τον ήλιο και η βαρύτητα είναι οι δυνάμεις 
που λειτουργούν στην κράτηση της στην τροχιά της γύρω από τον 
ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que el movimiento de 
un planeta lejos del sol y la gravedad son las fuerzas que trabajan en
mantenerla su órbita alrededor del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitationskraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
